name: uhgrf
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls))))

stmt.origin: ibi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wb(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wb(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wb(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ciedg, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ UHGraph →(c0 ∈ UHGraph ↔(c1 : dom(c1)→(P(c2)\ { ∅ }))))
⊣ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(iEdg ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ciedg, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ UHGraph →(c1 : dom(c1)→(P(c2)\ { ∅ })))
⊣ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(iEdg ` c0)

comment: The edge function of an undirected hypergraph is a function into the power set of the set of vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 9-Oct-2020.)
